item.title: Nike Air Zoom Hyperace 2 Men
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Nike Air Zoom Hyperace 2 Men The Nike AirZoom Hyperace 2 is a technical and lightweight indoor shoe with perfect damping. By using the right colors combined with the Nike logo, this shoe has a sharp and sporty appearance. Features and benefits – TPU heelcounter provides enough comfort and firmness – Made with small, self-breathing […]
item.content:encoded:
Nike Air Zoom Hyperace 2 Men

The Nike AirZoom Hyperace 2 is a technical and lightweight indoor shoe with perfect damping. By using the right colors combined with the Nike logo, this shoe has a sharp and sporty appearance.

Features and benefits
– TPU heelcounter provides enough comfort and firmness
– Made with small, self-breathing holes that keep your feet cool, dry and active
– The forefoot has some sort of airbag that gives an even better feeling while turning or moving quickly
– The back of the shoe fits sporty to the heel and won’t let you slide

item.title: Errea Knik Arm Sleeves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Errea Knik Arm Sleeves Errea Knik Arm Warmer Errea Arm sleeves Inspired by the NBA world, these arm warmers by Erreà are perfect for athletes who practice sport regularly and want to protect their joints both while training and during competitions. Especially appreciated in the running world, these arm warmers have been developed to protect […]
item.content:encoded:
Errea Knik Arm Sleeves

Errea Knik Arm Warmer
Errea Arm sleeves

Inspired by the NBA world, these arm warmers by Erreà are perfect for athletes who practice sport regularly and want to protect their joints both while training and during competitions. Especially appreciated in the running world, these arm warmers have been developed to protect elbow joints: they fit around your body perfectly, and they are very lightweight and thin. Their muscle-compressive reticular skeleton provides comfort without constraints. Also in this garment characterized by an athletic look, the knitted tubular fabric technology reduces seams to a minimum, providing comfort, breathability and ergonomic fitting.

Color: Red
SKU: U655-02

item.title: Tunturi Referee Cards Set
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Tunturi Referee Cards Set Hand out cards during football The Tunturi referee card set is the set that can be used by all referees. With 2 bright cards, yellow and red, it will always be clearly visible which card will be dealt. The referee card set comes with a storage case and a pencil. Color: […]
item.content:encoded:
Tunturi Referee Cards Set

Hand out cards during football
The Tunturi referee card set is the set that can be used by all referees. With 2 bright cards, yellow and red, it will always be clearly visible which card will be dealt. The referee card set comes with a storage case and a pencil.

Color:
SKU: 14TUSTE140

item.title: Erima Liga 2.0 Training Top Men
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Erima Liga 2.0 Training Top Men Breathable training top for cold days on the football pitch Features and benefits – Resilient, moisture-wicking material – Short zip with chin guard – Stand-up collar protects you and keeps you warm – Cuff with thumbhole – Open hem Color: Black / Purple SKU: 1261815
item.content:encoded:
Erima Liga 2.0 Training Top Men

Breathable training top for cold days on the football pitch

Features and benefits
– Resilient, moisture-wicking material
– Short zip with chin guard
– Stand-up collar protects you and keeps you warm
– Cuff with thumbhole
– Open hem

Color: Black / Purple
SKU: 1261815

item.title: Blindsave Goalie Gloves
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Blindsave Goalie Gloves Blindsave offers an absolutely new type of gloves: Light, breathable and with a specially covered sticky surface technology from American football. These gloves will help goalies to show their best performance in the goal. The palm side of the glove is made from a thin – rubber based – fabric that guarantees […]
item.content:encoded:
Blindsave Goalie Gloves

Blindsave offers an absolutely new type of gloves: Light,
breathable and with a specially covered sticky surface technology from American football. These gloves will help goalies to show their best performance in the goal. The palm side of the glove is made from a thin – rubber based – fabric that guarantees a perfect control of the ball.
In the same time, this innovative fabric surface is thick enough to keep your hands safe, even from the toughest shots. The stretch lycra fabric covers the backhand side of the glove and is excellent material to ensure a perfect fit and comfort. It is very breathable from both sides to keep you cool and avoid hands from sweating.

Features and benefits
– Sticky surface technology
– Breathable & Comfortable
– Provides the best protection

Color: Grey
SKU: GGG18-XS

item.title: Tunturi Bottle Rack
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Tunturi Bottle Rack Drinking during exercise The Tunturi foldable bottle rack is an easy bottle rack that can be used during team sports. With the bottle rack it is easy to take 8 bottles with you in one go. Ideal for football, volleyball or handball training. Because the rack is foldable, it can easily be […]
item.content:encoded:
Tunturi Bottle Rack

Drinking during exercise
The Tunturi foldable bottle rack is an easy bottle rack that can be used during team sports. With the bottle rack it is easy to take 8 bottles with you in one go. Ideal for football, volleyball or handball training.

Because the rack is foldable, it can easily be taken along. Water bottles in the photo are not included, these can be ordered separately

Color:
SKU: 14TUSTE103
